Domain 注釋或長文

Card of domain 注釋或長文

Name

注釋或長文

Code

type_memo

Data Type

national char varying(Max)

Mandatory

No


Code preview of the domain 注釋或長文

use SCMES
go

if exists(select 1 from systypes where name='type_memo')
drop type type_memo
go

use SCMES
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Domain: type_memo */
/*==============================================================*/
create type type_memo
from national char varying(Max)
go
